subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Rangers will need more than divine intervention and the resilience that Coach John Tortorella said “defines our team” if they are to take a 3-2 lead in the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: The Rangers will need more than divine intervention and the resilience that Coach John Tortorella said “defines our team” if they are to take a 3-2 lead in the Eastern Conference finals.
